title: vAnam tanai tudippAi
sahitya:
vAnam tanai tudippAi manadE dinamE 
aruLE uruvAi unakkE uyirum aruLum Anandanait-tudippAi


anupallavi

  Adarikkum uyar rAjanAi ArumaTra unakkuyir nEsanAi
uyirE tarum uruvAi nalamE tarum jIvAnandanait-tudippAi 
manamE dinamE Anandanait-tudippAi


caraNam 1    viNNorgaL ariyArgaL un nEsan enbadai 
para nAranAna kani mari bAlan vandAnE bhuviyil
vAnOr tudittiDum nAthanE mA lOkamE magizh manuvElanAi
marittE phalan aLittAn magizhndekkaLittE
Anandanait-tudippAi manadE dinamE
aruLE uruvAi unakkE uyirum aruLumAnandanait-tudippAi
    caraNam 2    sollAlum muDiyAdadallO paran aruL paran 
uravAna vidam ariyAmal paTrAdE bhuviyai
ellArkkum paripUraNan nallArkkum aruLum adhikAraNan
mana dEvA ninaittAn matiyODirundE Anandanait-
tudippAi manadE dinamE aruLE uruvAi 
unakkE uyirum aruLum Anandanait-tudippAi
